name: swiftfab-quote-system
description: SwiftFab Quote System - STEP file parser with material pricing

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && uv venv && uv pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:win: npm install && cd backend && uv venv && uv pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ..\frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:backend:win: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.setup:uv: npm install && cd backend && uv venv && uv pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
